languages.text: "Благодарю, {name}. Я немедленно извещу техносоратников, чтобы начинали подготовку к комплементат-ритуалу".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, {name}. Я немедленно извещу братию, чтобы начинали подготовку к комплиментат-ритуалу".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, {name}. Я немедленно извещу техносоратников, чтобы начинали подготовку к комплементат-ритуалу".

traits.locale_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「感謝する、{name}。技術同胞に、すぐに補足儀式の準備に取り掛かるよう知らせよう」
languages.original_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."

traits.locale_text: 「感謝する、{name}。技術同胞に、すぐに補足儀式の準備に取り掛かるよう知らせよう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “向你致以感激，{name}。我将通知我的技术伙伴立即开始准备重组仪式。”
languages.original_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."

traits.locale_text: “向你致以感激，{name}。我将通知我的技术伙伴立即开始准备重组仪式。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich danke Euch, {name}. Ich werde meine Techkameraden informieren, dass sie augenblicklich mit den Vorbereitungen für das Complementa-Ritual beginnen sollen."
languages.original_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke Euch, {name}. Ich werde meine Techkameraden informieren, dass sie augenblicklich mit den Vorbereitungen für das Complementa-Ritual beginnen sollen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous suis reconnaissant, {name}. Je vais de ce pas demander à mes technoconfrères de commencer les préparatifs du rituel complémentaire. »
languages.original_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous suis reconnaissant, {name}. Je vais de ce pas demander à mes technoconfrères de commencer les préparatifs du rituel complémentaire. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Tiene mi gratitud, {name}. Notificaré a mis tecnocamaradas que deben empezar cuanto antes los preparativos para el complementa-ritual».
languages.original_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene mi gratitud, {name}. Notificaré a mis tecnocamaradas que deben empezar cuanto antes los preparativos para el complementa-ritual».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Minnettarım {name}. Tümleyici ayinin hazırlıklarına başlamaları için derhâl tekno yoldaşlarımı bilgilendireceğim."
languages.original_text: "You have my gratitude, {name}. I will notify my tech-comrades to begin their preparations for the complementa-ritual at once."

traits.locale_text: "Minnettarım {name}. Tümleyici ayinin hazırlıklarına başlamaları için derhâl tekno yoldaşlarımı bilgilendireceğim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
